page.title: 04ACTIVITIES:CHERRY WILLINGHAM
page.content: As an adult in Cherry Willingham there are a range of activities. Since most adults work in Lincoln at the light engineering or electronics factories life in the week revolves around the home except for those who either go to evening institute or belong to clubs. Both of these groups meet either at the school or at the local village hall. Most people who go to the pub leave it until after about 9.30pm. and both pubs in the area and the one in Reepham out of the block enjoy a group of regular customers. Weekends are taken up with diverse activities although gardening must be labelled as a common activity and the gardens reflect this care. Major entertainment is found in Lincoln and this often is at the expense of local groups like the dramatic society.
